html:
• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

U.S. stock indexes were set to rebound on Thursday from a two-day selloff over signs of prolonged inflation, while Walt Disney Co tumbled as growth slowed in its streaming video service. (Full Story)

At 7:09 ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.15% at 36,045. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.39% at 4,660, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.66% at 16,085.75.

The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.NQ:
** Zip Recruiter <ZIP>, up 13.2%
** Charah Solutions Inc <CHRA.K>, up 12.1%
** Offerpad Solutions <OPAD.K>, up 10.6%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.NQ:
** Blend Labs Inc <BLND.K>, down 11.3%
** Bright Health <BHG>, down 11%
** Paysafe Ltd <PSFE.K>, down 10.2%

The top three Nasdaq percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.O:
** Fossil Group Inc <FOSL.O>, up 34.7%
** SoFi Technologies Equity Warrants <SOFIW.O>, up 29.5%
** Affirm Holdings Inc <AFRM.O>, up 26.4%

The top three Nasdaq percentage losers premarket .PRPL.O:
** Nisun International Enterprise Development Group Co Ltd <NISN.O>, down 19.4%
** Beyond Meat Inc <BYND.O>, down 19.1%
** Cricut Inc <CRCT.O>, down 17.3%


** Affirm AFRM.O: up 26.4% premarket
Affirm surges on revenue beat, expansion of Amazon tie-up (Full Story)

** Beyond Meat BYND.O: down 19.1% premarket
Beyond Meat drops 18% on 'beyond disappointing' results, forecast (Full Story) (Full Story)

** Affirm AFRM.O: up 26.4% premarket
